name: World Stadium EX
overview: World Stadium EX is the first game in Playstation of the World Stadium series. The game features different game modes: - VS Mode: Play against another human player or against the computer. - Season Mode: Choose a team and play a season. - Mini games: Choose a character and play different mini games of batting, throwing, etc. - Training Mode: This mode lets the player practice batting, throwing and catching. The game also features other game modes that will be unlocked playing the main modes.
